entry.title: BatchCam blog 1
entry.summary:
Current Version: 1.9.12

The Idea

New version is out

axscript for batch rendering in 3ds max. There are a few more attributes that can be used to help position the target element. Specify a px value in the gumby-offset attribute to set an offset from the fixed point, similarly a px offset for the pin point can be specified in gumby-pinoffset. The gumby-top attribute can then be used to specify the distance from the top of the window a fixed element should be, defaulting to 0.
